title: Mission: Magic!
overview: Magical teacher Miss Tickle and her Adventurers' Club meet everyday after school for meetings and go on exciting adventures with rock 'n' roll trouble-shooter Rick Springfield, who always contacts them on an old-fashioned gramophone, then Miss Tickle summons her cat, Tut Tut and draws a magic door on the writing board which sends she and her Adventurers' class (consisting of Franklin, Kim, Socks, Vinnie, Kim and Harvey) and meet Rick with his owl, Tolamy.
